com.anyicomplex.util4j

Class I18NResourceBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anyicomplex.util4j.I18NResourceBundle

  • public class I18NResourceBundle
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple utility class that reads I18N texts from resources files. Default locale is Locale.getDefault(), base name is "Messages".

    • Field Summary

      • setLocale

        public static void setLocale(java.util.Locale locale)
        Sets I18NResourceBundle's current locale. It will be used by I18NResourceBundle.getText(String key).
        Parameters:
        locale - locale will be set

        public static void setBaseName(java.lang.String baseName)

        Parameters:
        baseName - base name will be set

      • getText

        public static java.lang.String getText(java.util.Locale locale,
                                       java.lang.String key)
        Returns text string by key depends on specific locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - specific locale
        key - specific key
        Returns:
        text string value

      • getText

        public static java.lang.String getText(java.lang.String key)
        Returns text string by key depends on I18NResourceBundle's current locale. Also see I18NResourceBundle.getText(Locale, String)}.
        Parameters:
        key - specific key
        Returns:
        text string value
